hooks.command: echo '[SESSION START] If mcp__vibe__start_session is available, call it to restore previous context.'

echo '[DEBUG MODE] Focus on finding root cause. Check logs, trace execution flow, verify assumptions step by step.'
echo '[TEST MODE] Write comprehensive tests. Cover edge cases, error scenarios, and happy paths.'
